item.title: Hacker News Top Stories: Thursday, December 19, 2024 at 1:25 PM UTC
item.description:
1. Developing Developers (2015) (89 points | 39 comments)
2. Kowloon Walled City: Heterotopia in a Space of Disappearance (2013) (23 points | 5 comments)

5. Show HN: Postgres as a VectorDB GUI (112 points | 14 comments)
6. Firenvim – Turn the browser into a Neovim client (110 points | 19 comments)

9. ISO 8583: The language of credit cards (321 points | 60 comments)

11. Self-sorting arrays reveal unexpected competencies in minimal intelligence (136 points | 49 comments)
12. Our brains create mental "chapters" with new event segmentation study (110 points | 9 comments)
13. Exposing the Clearingstelle Urheberrecht Im Internet (CUII) (112 points | 21 comments)

21. Alignment faking in large language models (125 points | 100 comments)
22. Moon (2937 points | 243 comments)

24. Amazon workers to strike at multiple US warehouses during busy holiday season (164 points | 112 comments)
25. The longest straight line in Great Britain (without crossing a public road) (4 points | 1 comment)
26. Half My Life with Perl (114 points | 65 comments)
27. Analyzing the World Chess Championship 2024: Empirical synthesized approach (29 points | 32 comments)
